channel.title: Wolf Loving Bear Lover on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Wolf Loving Bear Lover on ZooBerry

item.title: Grizzly Bear Variant
item.description: A darker and more realistic skin for the Grizzly Bear.

item.title: Shadow Wolf
item.description: Shadow Wolves are PURE black wolves that ONLY live on Princess royal island (the island of the Spirit Bear).

item.title: Black Lion
item.description: A black coloration of the lion. This animal is recolored by Howling Shadow Wolf with coding by both Howling Shadow Wolf and Penguinman. I hope you enjoy it!

item.title: Black Bear
item.description: The North American black bear is the best known and most widespread of the North American bears.
